item.title: Working with Virtual Hard Disks in Windows 7 and Server 2008 R2
item.description: With the new versions of Windows, Virtual Hard Disks (VHDs) are no longer just for virtualized environments.

item.title: Installing CollabNet Subversion Server 1.6.3 and TortoiseSVN 1.6.3 on Windows Server 2003
item.description: In this article I install CollabNet Subversion Server 1.6.3, with TortoiseSVN 1.6.3, on Windows Server 2003 R2, Enterprise Edition, Service Pack 2.

item.title: Multiple network adapters in VirtualBox, for Windows guests
item.description: Setting up a second adapter for Windows guests in VirtualBox is easy, and seemingly safe.

item.title: Browser environments for testing
item.description: The three virtual environments I'd recommend for in-depth browser testing, for Web applications.

item.title: How to really compact Virtual PC hard drives
item.description: Experience with Virtual PC hard drives that just didn't want to compact (and what I was doing wrong).
